title: HAMBURGER STEAKS WITH MUSHROOM/ONION GRAVY
directions: 1. In a large bowl, mix together the ground beef, egg, bread crumbs, pepper, salt, onion powder, garlic, and Worcestershire sauce.
3. Heat the oil in a large skillet over medium heat.
4. Fry the patties, mushrooms and onion in the oil until patties are nicely browned.
5. Remove the beef patties to a plate, and keep warm.
6. Sprinkle flour over the mushrooms, onions and drippings in the skillet. Stir in flour with a fork, scraping bits of beef off of the bottom as you stir.
7. Gradually mix in the beef broth. Season with seasoned salt.
8. Simmer and stir over medium-low heat for about 5 minutes, until the gravy thickens.
9. Turn heat to low, return patties to the gravy, cover, and simmer for another 15 minutes.
10. Serve with a big bowl of mashed potatoes, buttered peas and fruit salad!!!
